metadata.title: CVE-2024-31392 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: If an insecure element was added to a page after a delay, Firefox would notreplace the secure icon with a mixed content security status Thisvulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 124.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
